title: Photo 509 /// Part 2 /// 257
description:
Photo 509 /// Part 2 /// 257

Part 2 of 2

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

2014, Panama - Whatever happened, should never have happened. Two smart, hardworking women traveled to another country. Looking for adventure they decided to take a long touristy hike out into the jungle from which they never returned. There have been many horrifying theories as to what may have taken place out there. This week we explore the very scary evidence left behind as we try to figure out what happened to Kris Kremers and Lisanne Froon. Beer of the Week - Brew Free or Die (Blood Orange IPA) Garage Grade - 5 out of 5

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
